About first: this is a constantly developing company, founded more than 8 years ago in Kharkov. During this time, we have gained enormous experience in the field of metalworking, creating parts of any configuration from various types of raw materials. Our staff consists of qualified specialists who know a lot about creating high-quality and precise parts and understand all the intricacies of the production process.
About second: The production of parts is carried out using the most modern and high-quality equipment (lathes, milling machines, foundries, etc.), thanks to which we are able to create products that fully meet your requirements. Quality control is carried out at every stage of production, which eliminates flaws and defects. We also guarantee stable mechanical properties of the products.
